title: Alzheimer's Association 24/7 Helpline
description: Round-the-clock phone, chat, and email support for dementia caregivers.
best_for: Best for urgent emotional support when new symptoms appear.

title: NIH Dementia Care Roadmap
description: Comprehensive education on dementia progression, treatment options, and caregiver planning.
best_for: Best for families newly navigating an early-stage dementia diagnosis.
